contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHTA | image = | city = [[Piedras Negras, Coahuila]], Mexico | area = [[Piedras Negras, Coahuila|Piedras Negras]] | branding = DINAMI-K 94.5 FM | slogan = Diferente A Todas, Igual A Ti... | airdate = | frequency = 94.5 FM | format = [[Top 40]] / [[Hip Hop]] | power = 3 kW | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = Radio ZÃ³calo | webcast = http://zocalo.audiovirtual.com.mx/players/loaderdinamica.html | website = www.zocalo.com.mx | affiliations = }} '''XHTA''' (branded as DINAMI-K 94.5 FM) is a [[Top 40]] and [[Hip Hop]] formatted FM [[radio station]], broadcasting on 94.5 MHz FM, that serves the area around [[Piedras Negras, Coahuila]]. <br clear=all> {{Piedras Negras Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Coahuila]] [[Category:Media in Piedras Negras, Coahuila]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
